snippet: Mullah Mohammad Omar, the Taliban leader, said in a statement that participating in the Afghan presidential vote next year would be “a waste of time.”
abstract: Taliban leader Mullah Muhammad Omar says group will not participate in Afghanistan's presidential election in 2014, despite efforts to broker peace between Afghanistan government and insurgents; says his movement will only support fully Islamic government.
lead_paragraph: Mullah Mohammad Omar, the Taliban leader, said in a statement that participating in the Afghan presidential vote next year would be “a waste of time.”

headline.main: Leader Says Taliban Will Sit Out 2014 Afghan Election
headline.print_headline: Leader Says Taliban Will Sit Out 2014 Afghan Election
